name: Platform Panic (itch) (Group5Games)
description:
NOTE: You may want to turn down the volume a bit. GB Studio plays music very loudly.

NOTE 2: During testing, we found that sometimes the crystals on level 3 don't appear. This seems to be a bug related to GB Studio, and the only current solution is to refresh the browser. This will reset the game.

Controls:

ENTER - Starts the game from the start menu.

AD/Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move left and right.

WS/Up and Down Arrow Keys - Move up and down ladders. W/Up is also used to interact with objects and doors.

Z - Use your wand to launch a duck.

X - Jump.
